answers.answer: Dnt stress, it does more bad then good.. Heartburn and feeling sick is normal you can take tums or rolaids and drink milk for the heartburn, for feeling sick try pretzels maybe.
okay thank you. Im willing to try anything I'm 10 weeks and a few days. But as I said I'm really nervous about having  a miscarriage. I just want a healthy baby.

Don't worry it's normal to worry when I was prego with my first baby I was the same way always checking if I was bleeding when I would pee my heat dropped when I would have sex with m hubby and I would spot I was at the e.r almost 5times a month it was crazy and my daughter is as healthy as she can b and now that I'm pregnant again I'm feeling the same way but now I know it's all in my head and try to relax cuz its not good for the baby to stress out. I wish u the best of luck
Have u miscarriaged be for?? I've had 2 miscarriages and that's why I freak out :(
I'm the same way. . Sadly all we can do is take care of our bodies and think positive. All will be well :)
Best advice I can offer is try not to worry,  you're just going to stress yourself out!
No I have never miscarried before and thanks ladys means allot..
I am constantly worried I will mis carry too :(

question: Im constantly worried I'm gonna miscarry. Im 17 years old I don't need negativity. I have type 1 diabetes and the doctors have put me at high high risk. My blood sugar levels have been everywhere I am beyond scared I'm going to end up screwing something up. I have heartburn like mad and am constantly feeling sick to my stomach but I don't have spotting I'm always stressing over the whole idea of losing my baby... Any ideas.
title: Help Is it normal?
